subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Toronto acquired the All-Star third baseman Josh Donaldson from Oakland for infielder Brett Lawrie, the left-hander Sean Nolin, the right-hander Kendall Graveman and the minor league shortstop Franklin Barreto.
snippet: Toronto acquired the All-Star third baseman Josh Donaldson from Oakland for infielder Brett Lawrie, the left-hander Sean Nolin, the right-hander Kendall Graveman and the minor league shortstop Franklin Barreto.
